metadata.title: CVE-2022-35650 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The vulnerability was found in Moodle, occurs due to input validation errorwhen importing lesson questions. This insufficient path checks results inarbitrary file read risk. This vulnerability allows a remote attacker toperform directory traversal attacks. The capability to access this featureis only available to teachers, managers and admins by default.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
